main event: A civilian couple observed two silver-gray objects shaped like a cross section of a cone moving intermittently at high speeds in Hillsborough, California.
interesting points: The objects were estimated to be 15 to 225 ft in diameter and were moving at an estimated speed of 1,500 mph., The objects traveled on a straight course and made no sound., The sighting lasted for approximately one minute and occurred at an altitude of 12,000 ft., The objects disappeared by fading out over the horizon., The observers were located approximately 500 ft above ground.
sighted object: two silver-gray objects shaped like a cross section of a cone
